author: Juan Emilio Canales
comment: I have a motorola 360, and this watch face is very attractive, but it does not work .  The two rectangles at bottom are always empty. I have many of the other Rich watch faces and they work just fine.
title: Titanium rich watch face

author: Siddharth Kshirsagar
comment: The watch face is very attractive no doubt, but give some more functionality like time zone option for LCD panel, its very helpful for a guy like me who travels a lot. Hoping to see it in next update.
title: Its good but...

author: Marcin Nowak
comment: Doesn't work on Motorola moto 360 2nd. Wasting time and money.
title: Marcin

comment: Come on... , why you not update it to support android wear 2? I have waiting to long time

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, Please wait for new update.. Problem is solved... Thanks

comment: Great Watch Face.  Using it for a while now. Please add a "square" ambient mode,  then it would be perfect.

comment: If this watch face had square ambient mode I would love it.

comment: Good looking watch face but needs to be able use watch hands in dim mode.

reply.content: Hi, Please wait for new update.. Problem is solved... Thanks

author: Andrew Kajda
comment: It has a nice clean analog view, complemented with a digital display

author: Arnon Goldstein
comment: Bugs fixed. Thanks!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, Please wait for new update.. Problem is solved... Thanks

author: RAGHAVAN S
comment: Stunning watch face. But what's the use if we're not able to keep it that way.!  It lacks the basic option to have No Ambient mode at all or some amount of information to be shown in Ambient mode. Please include this option and I'll love it for sure..

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Raghavan,

Please turn on GPS on phone so weather provider can find your location.

Regards

title: Good looking watch face, but lacks Full /No Ambient mode.

author: Daryl Ford
comment: Seems like most of the watch faces in the play store from this developer and others, just drains the battery rapidly. I get around 8 hours. That's with tilt to wake off. With the stock watch faces, I can get 36 hours (moto 360, nexus 6).
title: Love it, but it gulps battery.

author: Joe Richardson
comment: I was specifically looking for an analog formatted display that gave the digital time as well, but wasn't too 'busy'. This does what I want. The only complaint that I have is that the hands of the watch 'scroll' into position when it wakes, sip you have to wait for it to stabilize. Still, this is as close to a perfect watch gave as I have found.
title: My go to watch face

author: Stanley Overby
comment: Great watchface & the developer is very responsive so if you have any issues he is very helpful. I love the idea of having a watch face that tells you if you have any missed messages, phone calls, voice mails, etc. Hopefully one day you will be able to respond with a quick message right from the watch face.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi Stanley, did you tried to find configuration app in Android Wear app? Regards

title: Great Watch face

author: Richard Thompson
comment: Found the settings, in the android wear application itself. Now if only it had all the settings their other faces did - for example, the ability to turn off transparent cards, or set to full ambient mode.  With transparent cards you can't read any notifications in the ambient mode.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, Please wait for new update.. Problem is solved... Thanks

comment: Drains battery on phone and doesnt update phone battery correctly.  When will we get battery update fix?

reply.author: RichFace

comment: On the new Huawei  no text visible,  I have tried several settings and  back  to  default,  without  result,  I hope  we  get  an  update  for  this  issue

author: James Bannister
comment: Nice watch face but app not showing up in app drawer so I can't customize it

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi James,

just go to Android Wear app and select this watch face, then tap again on icon and you will get configuration app.

Regards

author: Jonathan Michael
comment: Thanks for the support!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Jonathan,

yes, you can turn it off in configuration app. Just go to Android Wear app and select this watch face, then tap again on icon and you will get configuration app. Here you can set color, time format etc.

Regards
